data.title: Companies have more leeway to step up on political stances
data.text: Julie Hootkin, partner at Global Strategy Group, discusses the fervor and activism of consumers who boycott companies at odds with their political views.

data.title: iPhone XR vs. Pixel 3
data.text: We've spent six months with these premium phones from Apple and Google. Here are some things to keep in mind if you're choosing between the two.
